// src/pages/About.js import React from 'react'; import '../styles/about.css'; function About() { return (

Hey there, I'm Sara!

A budding Data Analyst with a passion for turning data into actionable insights...

My journey is driven by a strong desire to excel...

Before coming to Trinity College Dublin to pursue my degree in Data Science...

Journey from Writing <code> to Solving Problems using Data

Since high school, I've been hooked on tech innovations and breakthroughs...

Experience

  • Accenture – Associate Software Engineer
  • ERP Launchpad – Data Analyst Intern
  • Fundflo Technologies – Engineering Intern
  • Persistent Systems – Summer Intern

Education

  • Trinity College Dublin – Master's in Computer Science - Data Science
  • Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology – Bachelor's in Technology - IT

Other Interests

Swimming, Travelling✈️, Reading, Art, Geography / Geoguesser

Ready to elevate your Data Experience?

Let’s connect!

); } export default About;
